basics.summary: 2nd year student in NYU Archives and Public History Program

work.name: NYU Libraries
work.summary: Collaborating on research projects, program development, and providing faculty, students, and staff with technical and service support for digital scholarship

work.name: NYU Libraries
work.summary: Performing quality assurance measured on crawled websites using the Internet Archives' Archive-It service, and implementing solutions for more accurate captures

work.name: Los Angeles County Museum of Art
NHMLAC Seaver Center for Western History Research

internships.name: Los Angeles County Museum of Art

projects.name: Digitization & Access Plan - CENTRO Archives
projects.summary: As a part of HIST-GA 1011 Digital Archives, I collaborated with CENTRO Archives to produce a Digitization & Access Plan for the Community and Activism sub-series of the Ibrahim Gonzalez Papers

projects.name: Record Management Proposal - CAAAV Organizing Asian Communities
projects.summary: As a part of HIST-GA 2018 Community Archives, I created a record management plan for the digital assets on CAAAV's Google Drive to ensure staff and volunteers could more easily navigate and locate relevant records
